short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays public holidays in Germany for a selected year and federal state.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can display public holidays in Germany for a selected year and federal state. You just have to type in the year and select the desired federal state from drop down menu. The results are fetched from official sources.
